Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is BULGARIA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 16 BG.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Central Stara Planina (Balkan Mountains). The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Karlovo Municipality in Plovdiv Province (BG421).   The size of the area (km2) is 1040. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is unspecified. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is unspecified. The total population (in thousand) is 48.277. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 46.42. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) is unspecified. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 63.70. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.06%. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 18.60%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 32.40%. The Rose Valley is a region located on the southern slopes of the Central Stara Planina. It is famous for the local rose-growing industry and the distillation of rose oil. The region is also a centre for the production of other essential oils, including those from species collected or cultivated in the nearby mountains. Specialist companies in the locality - and elsehwere in Bulgaria - produce a range of cosmetic products using oils from the mountain species.   N/A.
